titles: A meditacion vpo[n] the the [sic] lordes praier, made by Thomas Leuer, at sainct Mary Woll churche in London
author: Lever, Thomas, 1521-1577.
publisher: By [R. Grafton for] Jhon Kyngston, cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. And are to be sold at the west doore of Paules, by Anthony Kyngston],
notes: Place of publication, and publisher's and bookseller's names from colophon; printer's name from STC.
"Folger Shakespeare Library copy has title corrected in press."--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
